name: channels-dvr
description: Channels DVR Server allows users to record live TV streams and watch them on any device. It integrates with HDHomeRun tuners and offers mobile apps, web playback, and automatic commercial skipping for home DVR setups.
features: Live TV Recording: Record over-the-air TV with HDHomeRun tuners. Personal DVR.
Multi-Device Playback: Watch on phones, tablets, and computers. Anywhere access.
Commercial Skipping: Automatic detection and skipping of commercials. Better viewing.
Web Interface: Manage recordings through browser. Easy control.
Mobile Apps: Native apps for iOS and Android. Optimized experience.
Home DVR: Complete DVR solution for cord-cutters. Cable-free TV.
Episode Management: Organize and manage recorded shows. Library organization.
